articles.title: Cannabis Commission head was wrongly terminated, judge says
summary: Shannon O'Brien, former state treasurer, was wrongly terminated as head of the Cannabis Commission.
Judge ruled that O'Brien should be reinstated to serve the remainder of her term and awarded back pay.
The decision was reported by Boston.com.
